data_table.description: Physical and Neurological Exam, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Physical and Neurological Exam]

variable.name: PNE1
variable.description: A. Strength. Q1. Right leg strength [Physical and Neurological Exam]

variable.name: PNE2
variable.description: A. Strength. Q2. Left leg strength [Physical and Neurological Exam]

variable.name: PNE3
variable.description: A. Strength. Q3. Right arm strength [Physical and Neurological Exam]

variable.name: PNE4
variable.description: A. Strength. Q4. Left arm strength [Physical and Neurological Exam]

variable.name: PNE5
variable.description: B. Reflexes. Q5. Deep tendon reflexes [Physical and Neurological Exam]

variable.name: PNE6
variable.description: C. Gaze. Q6. Best gaze score [Physical and Neurological Exam]

variable.name: PNE7
variable.description: D. Visual. Q7. Visual score [Physical and Neurological Exam]

variable.name: PNE8
variable.description: E. Facial Palsy. Q8. Facial palsy score [Physical and Neurological Exam]

variable.name: PNE9A
variable.description: F. Limb Ataxia. Q9a. Ataxia right arm [Physical and Neurological Exam]

variable.name: PNE9A1
variable.description: F. Limb Ataxia. Q9a1. Explain amputation or joint fusion in right arm ataxia [Physical and Neurological Exam]

variable.name: PNE9B
variable.description: F. Limb Ataxia. Q9b. Ataxia left arm [Physical and Neurological Exam]

variable.name: PNE9B1
variable.description: F. Limb Ataxia. Q9b1. Explain amputation or joint fusion in left arm ataxia [Physical and Neurological Exam]

variable.name: PNE9C
variable.description: F. Limb Ataxia. Q9c. Ataxia right leg [Physical and Neurological Exam]

variable.name: PNE9C1
variable.description: F. Limb Ataxia. Q9c1. Explain amputation or joint fusion in right leg ataxia [Physical and Neurological Exam]

variable.name: PNE9D
variable.description: F. Limb Ataxia. Q9d. Ataxia left leg [Physical and Neurological Exam]

variable.name: PNE9D1
variable.description: F. Limb Ataxia. Q9d1. Explain amputation or joint fusion in left leg ataxia [Physical and Neurological Exam]

variable.name: PNE10
variable.description: G. Sensory. Q10. Sensory Score [Physical and Neurological Exam]

variable.name: PNE11
variable.description: H. Extinction and Inattention. Q11. Extinction And Inattention Score [Physical and Neurological Exam]

variable.name: PNE12
variable.description: I. Best Language, Q12. Language Score [Physical and Neurological Exam]

variable.name: PNE13
variable.description: J. Babinski. Q13. Plantar Response [Physical and Neurological Exam]

variable.name: PNE0AY
variable.description: Administrative Information. Q0a. Year of completion date [Physical and Neurological Exam]
